column4: hey there guys, I reinstalled 8.10 because ATI dropped my video card - and now the restricted device manager isn't working properly
I try to activate the driver - and it just gives me a big red X
what graphic card do you have?

your card is no longer supported by ati in linux see here http://www.linux-magazine.com/Online/News/AMD-Provides-Legacy-Driver-for-Old-ATI-Cards/%28kategorie%29/0  you can install the open-source drivers or an older one from ati's website i think
